item.title: Android Content Providers Generator
item.description: During the refactoring of my two years old app DroidAlone, I decided to try to access to the storage through a ContentProvider. Even if the official documentation warns that there is no need to use content providers if your app does not want to export it's data against other apps, there are a bunch of advantages in using a content provider in your app. The main and more obvious advantage is that you can use a Loader with your data.
